name: DSRCMessageManager
description: Plugin that listens for TMX messages and forwards them to the DSRC Radio (i.e. the RSU).

configuration.description: JSON data defining the message types and PSIDs for messages forwarded to the DSRC radio at destination 1.
JSON data defining the message types and PSIDs for messages forwarded to the DSRC radio at destination 2.
JSON data defining the message types and PSIDs for messages forwarded to the DSRC radio at destination 3.
JSON data defining the message types and PSIDs for messages forwarded to the DSRC radio at destination 4.

configuration.default: <ip addr of rsu>:<port used in rsu>
configuration.description: The destination UDP server(s) and port number(s) on the DSRC radio for all messages specified by Messages_Destination_1.
The destination UDP server(s) and port number(s) on the DSRC radio for all messages specified by Messages_Destination_2.
The destination UDP server(s) and port number(s) on the DSRC radio for all messages specified by Messages_Destination_3.
The destination UDP server(s) and port number(s) on the DSRC radio for all messages specified by Messages_Destination_4.
True or False value indicating whether to sign the messages.
